item.description:
We'll be having the next meeting at the Harlow Street Gallery. It's a huge space. We'll be able to have a more private setting there.

Feel free to bring drinks or food for yourselves as this space doesn't have a resturant.

We will be having the Olympus Reps in to speak to us about their new cameras. We may have a member from the Boston meetup group there to give us a HBDI survery. The HBDI is the Herrman Brain Dominance Instrument. It's designed to find out how our brain "sees" things. This is purely up to you if you'd like to participate it's not mandatory.

Please bring any new work you'd like to share and discuss.

See you there.

Scott

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Worcester Photography May Meetup
